tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dashboard_deforestation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    deforestation_area FLOAT,
    climate_change_impact TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ClimateChangeData (
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    carbon_dioxide DECIMAL,
    deforestation_percentage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE VisualizationData (
    data_id INT,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    carbon_dioxide DECIMAL,
    deforestation_impact DECIMAL,
    primary_key(data_id)
);
